name: Prototype N
description:
Finally, this is the day this game gets its first public demo debut! This is a side scrolling run-and-gun platformer with tight gameplay and fun action! This early demo only contains a single level with a focus on its core mechanics and a taste of what's to come.

Please be aware the game is in its early stages of development as it had a soft reboot a few weeks ago. The game has since been tweaked and polished a lot, but there may be a few bugs that snuck their way in. If there's any game breaking issues, feel free to tell me!

Controls Manual & Credits found in the zip file.

Latest build: v1.0.0 (July 20th, 2020) - First release.
